snippet: The government of Slovakia is preparing to sell its 49 percent in the telecom provider in an initial public offering in Bratislava and in London.
lead_paragraph: The government of Slovakia is preparing to sell its 49 percent in the telecom provider in an initial public offering in Bratislava and in London.

headline.main: Slovakia Seeks to Raise Up to $1.1 Billion in Slovak Telecom I.P.O.
